00173 template <typename Type> Vector<Type>::Vector(int newSize, const Type* type) 
00174 : size(newSize), vector(new Type[newSize])

00202 
00203 template <typename Type>
00204 Vector<Type>& Vector<Type>::operator=(const Vector<Type>& oldVector)
00205 {
00206    if(this != &oldVector)
00207    {
00208       if(size != oldVector.size)
00209       {
00210          if(vector != 0)
00211          {
00212             delete [] (vector);
00213          }
00214 
00215          size = oldVector.size;
00216 
00217          vector = new Type[size];
00218       }
00219 
00220       for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00221       {
00222          vector[i] = oldVector[i];
00223       }
00224    }
00225 
00226    return(*this);
00227 }

00234 template <typename Type>
00235 inline Type& Vector<Type>::operator[](const int i) 
00236 {
00237    // Control sentence (if debug)
00238 
00239    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00240 
00241    if(i >= size)
00242    {
00243       std::cerr << std::endl
00244                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template. " << std::endl
00245                 << "Reference operator []." << std::endl
00246                 << "Index is " << i << " and it must be less than " << size << "." << std::endl
00247                 << std::endl;
00248 
00249       exit(1);
00250    }
00251 
00252    #endif
00253 
00254    // Return vector element
00255 
00256    return(vector[i]);
00257 }

00315 // void resize(int) method
00316 
00321 
00322 template <typename Type>
00323 inline void Vector<Type>::resize(int newSize)
00324 {
00325    if(newSize > size)
00326    {
00327       Vector<Type> newVector(newSize);   
00328 
00329       for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00330       {
00331         newVector[i] = vector[i];
00332       }
00333 
00334       vector = new Type[newSize];
00335 
00336       for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00337       {
00338          vector[i] = newVector[i];      
00339       }
00340 
00341       size = newSize;
00342    }
00343    else if(newSize < size)
00344    {      
00345       Vector<Type> newVector(newSize);   
00346 
00347       for(int i = 0; i < newSize; i++)
00348       {
00349         newVector[i] = vector[i];
00350       }
00351 
00352       vector = new Type[newSize];
00353 
00354       for(int i = 0; i < newSize; i++)
00355       {
00356          vector[i] = newVector[i];      
00357       }
00358 
00359       size = newSize;
00360    }
00361    else
00362    {
00363       // Do nothing
00364    }
00365 }

00368 // void fillAtRandom(void) method
00369 
00371 
00372 template <class Type>
00373 inline void Vector<Type>::fillAtRandom(void)
00374 {
00375    double random = 0.0;
00376 
00377    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00378    {
00379       random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
00380 
00381       vector[i] = -1.0 + 2.0*random;
00382    }
00383 }
00384 
00385 
00386 // void fillAtRandom(double, double) method
00387 
00393 
00394 template <class Type>
00395 inline void Vector<Type>::fillAtRandom(double minimum, double maximum)
00396 {
00397    // Control sentence (if debug)
00398 
00399    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00400 
00401    if(minimum > maximum)
00402    {
00403       std::cerr << std::endl
00404                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template." << std::endl 
00405                 << "void fillAtRandom(double, double) method." << std::endl
00406                 << "Minimum value must be less or equal than maximum value." << std::endl
00407                 << std::endl;
00408 
00409       exit(1);
00410    }
00411 
00412    #endif
00413 
00414    double random = 0.0;
00415 
00416    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00417    {
00418       random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
00419 
00420       vector[i] =  minimum + (maximum - minimum)*random;
00421    }
00422 }

00425 // Type calculateMinimum(void) method
00426 
00428 
00429 template <typename Type>
00430 inline Type Vector<Type>::calculateMinimum()
00431 {
00432    Type minimum = vector[0];
00433 
00434    for(int i = 1; i < size; i++)
00435    {
00436       if(vector[i] < minimum)
00437       {
00438          minimum = vector[i];
00439       }
00440    }
00441    
00442    return(minimum);
00443 }

00472 inline int Vector<Type>::calculateMinimalIndex()
00473 {

00513 // Type calculateMean(void) method
00514 
00516 
00517 template <typename Type>
00518 inline Type Vector<Type>::calculateMean(void)
00519 {
00520    Type mean = 0;
00521 
00522    double sum = 0.0;
00523 
00524    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00525    {
00526       sum += vector[i];
00527    }
00528 
00529    mean = sum/(double)size;
00530    
00531    return(mean);
00532 }
00533 
00534 
00535 // Type calculateStandardDeviation(void) method
00536 
00538 
00539 template <typename Type>
00540 inline Type Vector<Type>::calculateStandardDeviation(void)
00541 {
00542    Type standardDeviation = 0;
00543 
00544    double mean = calculateMean();
00545 
00546    double sum = 0.0;
00547    
00548    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00549    {
00550       sum += pow(vector[i] - mean, 2);
00551    }
00552 
00553    standardDeviation = sqrt(sum/(double)size);
00554    
00555    return(standardDeviation);
00556 }
00557 
00558 
00559 // double calculateNorm(void) method
00560 
00562 
00563 template <typename Type>
00564 inline double Vector<Type>::calculateNorm()
00565 {
00566    // Control sentence (if debug)
00567 
00568    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00569 
00570    if(size == 0)
00571    {
00572       std::cerr << std::endl
00573                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template." << std::endl 
00574                 << "double calculateNorm(void) method." << std::endl
00575                 << "Size of vector is zero." << std::endl
00576                 << std::endl;
00577 
00578       exit(1);
00579    }
00580 
00581    #endif
00582 
00583    double norm = 0.0;
00584 
00585    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00586    {
00587       norm += vector[i]*vector[i];
00588    }
00589    
00590    norm = sqrt(norm);
00591    
00592    return(norm);
00593 }

00601 inline Vector<Type> Vector<Type>::operator + (Type scalar)
00602 {       
00603    Vector<Type> sum(size);
00604 
00605    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00606    {
00607       sum[i] = vector[i] + scalar;
00608    }
00609    
00610    return(sum);

00614 // Vector<Type> operator + (Vector<Type>)
00615 
00617 
00618 template <typename Type>
00619 inline Vector<Type> Vector<Type>::operator + (Vector<Type> otherVector)
00620 {       
00621    // Control sentence (if debug)
00622 
00623    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00624 
00625    int otherSize = otherVector.getSize();
00626 
00627    if(otherSize != size)
00628    {
00629       std::cerr << std::endl
00630                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template. " << std::endl
00631                 << "Vector<Type> operator + (Vector<Type>)." << std::endl
00632                 << "Size of vectors is " << size << " and " << otherSize << " and they must be the same." 
00633                 << std::endl
00634                 << std::endl;
00635 
00636       exit(1);          
00637    }
00638 
00639    #endif
00640 
00641 
00642    Vector<Type> sum(size);
00643   
00644    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00645    {
00646       sum[i] = vector[i] + otherVector[i];
00647    }
00648    
00649    return(sum);
00650 }

00691                 << std::endl;

00696    #endif

00699

00701    {
00702       difference[i] = vector[i] - otherVector[i];
00703    }
00704

00728

00731 template <typename Type>
00732 inline Vector<Type> Vector<Type>::operator * (Vector<Type> otherVector)
00733 {       
00734    // Control sentence (if debug)      
00735        
00736    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00737 
00738    int otherSize = otherVector.getSize();
00739 
00740    if(otherSize != size)
00741    {
00742       std::cerr << std::endl
00743                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template." << std::endl 
00744                 << "Vector<Type> operator * (Vector<Type>)." << std::endl
00745                 << "Both vector sizes must be the same." << std::endl
00746                 << std::endl;
00747 
00748       exit(1);          
00749    }
00750 
00751    #endif
00752 
00753    Vector<Type> product(size);
00754   
00755    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00756    {
00757       product[i] = vector[i]*otherVector[i];
00758    }
00759    
00760    return(product);

00763 
00764 // Vector<Type> operator * (Matrix<Type>)  
00765 
00767 
00768 template <typename Type>
00769 inline Vector<Type> Vector<Type>::operator * (Matrix<Type> matrix)
00770 {
00771    int numberOfRows = matrix.getNumberOfRows();
00772 
00773    // Control sentence (if debug)      
00774 
00775    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00776 
00777    if(numberOfRows != size)
00778    {
00779       std::cerr << std::endl
00780                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template." << std::endl 
00781                 << "Type operator * (Matrix<Type>)." << std::endl
00782                 << "Matrix number of rows must be equal to vector size." << std::endl
00783                 << std::endl;
00784 
00785       exit(1);          
00786    }
00787 
00788    #endif
00789 
00790    int numberOfColumns = matrix.getNumberOfColumns();
00791 
00792    Vector<Type> product(numberOfColumns);
00793   
00794    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfColumns; j++)
00795    {     
00796       product[j] = 0;      
00797 
00798       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfRows; i++)
00799       {
00800          product[j] += vector[i]*matrix[i][j];
00801       }
00802    }
00803     
00804    return(product);
00805 }

00808 // Vector<Type> dot(Vector<Type>) method
00809 
00811 
00812 template <typename Type>
00813 inline Type Vector<Type>::dot(Vector<Type> otherVector)
00814 {            
00815    // Control sentence (if debug)      
00816 
00817    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00818 
00819    int otherSize = otherVector.getSize();
00820 
00821    if(otherSize != size)
00822    {
00823       std::cerr << std::endl
00824                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template." << std::endl 
00825                 << "Type dot(Vector<Type>) method." << std::endl
00826                 << "Both vector sizes must be the same." << std::endl
00827                 << std::endl;
00828 
00829       exit(1);          
00830    }
00831 
00832    #endif
00833 
00834    Type dotProduct = 0;
00835   
00836    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00837    {
00838       dotProduct += vector[i]*otherVector[i];
00839    }
00840    
00841    return(dotProduct);
00842 }

00844 
00845 // Matrix<Type> outer(Vector<Type>) method
00846 
00848 
00849 template <typename Type>
00850 inline Matrix<Type> Vector<Type>::outer(Vector<Type> otherVector)
00851 {            
00852    int otherSize = otherVector.getSize();
00853 
00854    // Control sentence (if debug)      
00855 
00856    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00857 
00858    if(otherSize != size)
00859    {
00860       std::cerr << std::endl
00861                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template." << std::endl 
00862                 << "Matrix<Type> outer(Vector<Type>) method." << std::endl
00863                 << "Both vector sizes must be the same." << std::endl
00864                 << std::endl;
00865 
00866       exit(1);          
00867    }
00868 
00869    #endif
00870 
00871    int numberOfRows = size;
00872    int numberOfColumns = otherSize;
00873    
00874    Matrix<Type> outer(numberOfRows, numberOfColumns);
00875      
00876    for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfRows; i++)
00877    {
00878       for(int j = 0;  j < numberOfColumns; j++)
00879       {
00880          outer[i][j] = vector[i]*otherVector[j];
00881       }           
00882    }
00883    
00884    return(outer);
00885 }

00893 inline Vector<Type> Vector<Type>::operator / (Type scalar)
00894 {       
00895    Vector<Type> cocient(size);
00896 
00897    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00898    {
00899       cocient[i] = vector[i]/scalar;
00900    }
00901    
00902    return(cocient);
00903 }

00924                 << "Both vector sizes must be the same." << std::endl
00925                 << std::endl;
00926 
00927       exit(1);          
00928    }
00929 
00930    #endif
00931

00964 
00965 // DESTRUCTOR
00966 
00968 
00969 template <typename Type> 
00970 Vector<Type>::~Vector()
00971 {
00972    if(vector != 0)
00973    {
00974       delete[](vector);
00975    }
00976 }
00977 
00978 
00979 // Input operator
00980 
00982 
00983 template<typename Type>
00984 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, Vector<Type>& v)
00985 {
00986    int size = v.getSize();
00987    
00988    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00989    {
00990       is >> v[i];
00991    }
00992 
00993    return(is);
00994 }

00997 // Output operator
00998 
01000 
01001 template<typename Type>
01002 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, Vector<Type>& v)
01003 {
01004    int size = v.getSize();
01005    
01006    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
01007    {
01008       os << v[i] << " ";
01009    }
01010 
01011    return(os);
01012 }

01015 // void load(char*) method
01016 
01026 
01027 template <class Type>
01028 inline void Vector<Type>::load(char* filename)
01029 {
01030    std::fstream file;
01031 
01032    // Open file
01033     
01034    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
01035 
01036    if(!file.is_open())
01037    {
01038       std::cerr << std::endl
01039                 << "Flood Error: Vector template." << std::endl
01040                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
01041                 << "Cannot open vector data file."  << std::endl
01042                 << std::endl;
01043 
01044       exit(1);
01045    }
01046    else
01047    {
01048       std::cout << std::endl
01049                 << "Loading vector from data file..." << std::endl;
01050    }
01051 
01052    // Read file
01053 
01054    file >> size;   
01055 
01056    resize(size);
01057 
01058    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
01059    {
01060       file >> vector[i];
01061    }
01062 
01063    // Close file
01064 
01065    file.close();
01066 }

01069 // void save(char*) method
01070 
01076 
01077 template <class Type>
01078 inline void Vector<Type>::save(char* filename)
01079 {
01080    std::fstream file; 
01081 
01082    // Open file
01083 
01084    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
01085 
01086    if(!file.is_open())
01087    {
01088       std::cerr << std::endl 
01089                 << "Flood Error: Vector template." << std::endl
01090                 << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
01091                 << "Cannot open vector data file." << std::endl
01092                 << std::endl;
01093 
01094       exit(1);
01095    }
01096    else
01097    {
01098       std::cout << std::endl 
01099                 << "Saving vector to data file..." 
01100                 << std::endl;
01101    }
01102 
01103    // Write file
01104 
01105    file << size << std::endl;
01106 
01107    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
01108    {
01109       file << vector[i] << " ";
01110    }
01111 
01112    file << std::endl;
01113 
01114    // Close file
01115 
01116    file.close();
01117 }

01120 // void insert(int, Vector<Type>) method
01121 
01123 
01124 template <typename Type>
01125 inline void Vector<Type>::insert(int position, Vector<Type> otherVector)
01126 {       
01127    int otherSize = otherVector.getSize();
01128 
01129    // Control sentence (if debug)            
01130 
01131    #ifndef NDEBUG 
01132 
01133    if(position + otherSize > size)
01134    {
01135       std::cerr << std::endl
01136                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template." << std::endl 
01137                 << "void insert(Vector<Type>, int) method." << std::endl
01138                 << "Cannot insert vector." << std::endl
01139                 << std::endl;
01140 
01141       exit(1);          
01142    }
01143 
01144    #endif
01145 
01146    for(int i = 0; i < otherSize; i++)
01147    {
01148       vector[position + i] = otherVector[i];
01149    }
01150 }
01151 
01152 
01153 // Vector<Type> extract(int, int) method
01154 
01156 
01157 template <typename Type>
01158 inline Vector<Type> Vector<Type>::extract(int position, int otherSize)
01159 {            
01160    // Control sentence (if debug)            
01161 
01162    #ifndef NDEBUG 
01163 
01164    if(position + otherSize > size)
01165    {
01166       std::cerr << std::endl
01167                 << "Flood Error: Vector Template." << std::endl 
01168                 << "Vector<Type> extract(int, int) method." << std::endl
01169                 << "Cannot extract vector." << std::endl
01170                 << std::endl;
01171 
01172       exit(1);          
01173    }
01174 
01175    #endif
01176 
01177    Vector<Type> otherVector(otherSize);
01178 
01179    for(int i = 0; i < otherSize; i++)
01180    {
01181       otherVector[i] = vector[position + i];
01182    }
01183 
01184    return(otherVector);
01185 }
01186 
01187 
01188 // Vector<Type> assemble(Vector<Type>) method
01189 
01191 
01192 template <typename Type>
01193 inline Vector<Type> Vector<Type>::assemble(Vector<Type> otherVector)
01194 {            
01195    int otherSize = otherVector.getSize();
01196 
01197    Vector<double> assembly(size + otherSize);
01198 
01199    for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
01200    {
01201       assembly[i] = vector[i];
01202    }
01203 
01204    for(int i = 0; i < otherSize; i++)
01205    {
01206       assembly[size+i] = otherVector[i];
01207    } 
01208    
01209    return(assembly);
01210 }

01213 }
